title: League Mac client
body:
Is there any actual fixes to the Mac client not working?

It's insane how many threads there are stating that there's a problem with the problem but so few genuine solutions.

replies.body:
Solution!

Search up 'Riot Games' in finder. There will be a folder. Right click on the application 'Riot Client'. Move 'Riot Client' to trash. Then open 'League of Legends' Application.

It should automatically re-download the 'Riot Client'. Open the 'Riot Client' and it should take you to the login after downloading and updating (takes a min).

Ps. This happened to me today, and after reinstalling 3 times this worked!
